archimate:BusinessRole.name: Decision Model Management (business role)
archimate:BusinessRole.documentation: Decision model management describes the systems used by data scientists and business analysts as they configure analytics models and rules to execute inside the data reservoir. Advanced analytics and data mining is managed from decision model management. These teams need access to samples of the data. This data must be formatted for analysis tools and the environment must have sufficient performance capacity to handle intense, lumpy workloads from the mining and testing processing.
